channel.title: Yue Jiang | 姜岳
channel.description: Recent content on Yue Jiang | 姜岳

item.title: Reading Prism files into R
item.description: Example Prism files Main functionality Additional features Back in the early days of grad school I used to use Prism GraphPad a lot before switching to R. Prism is a great piece of software and I’ve seen scientists using them a lot. Recently I wanted to import a Prism .pzfx file into R, and as usual, I went to Google expecting there’ll be some readxl or readr equivalent for prism.

item.title: Show me what you got
item.description: The data Make some plots Side Notes Alright, let’s see what we can do here. Too much iris could be boring, so I thought I’d contribute some data by myself. Since my fitbit stopped working early this year, I’ve switched back to my old Garmin forerunner 10, and it turns out that you can downlowd .csv file of previous activities through

Education Duke University, Durham, NC PhD, Genetics and Genomics, 2009-2015 MS, Statistics, 2013-2015 Peking University, Beijing, China BS, School of Life Sciences, 2004-2008 Experience Juno Therapeutics \(\rightarrow\) Celgene, Boston, MA \(\rightarrow\) Seattle, WA Data Scientist \(\rightarrow\) Senior Data Scientist, 2016-present Google [X] \(\rightarrow\) Verily Life Sciences, Mountain View, CA Decision Support Engineering Analyst Intern, summer 2015

Journals Yi Yin, Yue Jiang, Joel B. Berletch, Christine M. Disteche, William S. Noble, Frank J. Steemers, Andrew C. Adey, Jay A. Shendure. “High-throughput mapping of meiotic crossover and chromosome mis-segregation events in interspecific hybrid mice.” bioRxiv, 2018. Grigaityte K, Carter JA, Goldfless SJ, Jeffery EW, Hause RJ, Jiang Y, Koppstein D, Briggs AW, Church GM, Vigneault F, Atwal GS. “Single-cell sequencing reveals \(\alpha\beta\) chain pairing shapes the T cell repertoire.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello world! This is the end of 2017, and I’m on my winter break. So I thought I’d play with the blogdown package and see if I can come up with some sort of site from within R. So here I am. 你好，世界

item.title: Jiang, Yue 姜岳
item.description: Neuroscientist by training, used to work on smell. Now working on the analytics side of immuno-oncology at Juno Therapeutics / Celgene. 生物制药从业者。念书的时候是研究嗅觉的。现在研究肿瘤免疫。
